title: lyft3d inference kernel
description: Please check out Guido's excellent kernel here. In this kernel i show how to perform inference on test set using the trained model. I just added RaDAM optimzer and got some better score. You can find the BEV of the test set here. Updates: Corrected yaw calculation Used category height information
description_lemmatized: please check guidos excellent kernel kernel show perform inference test set using trained model added radam optimzer got better score find bev test set update corrected yaw calculation used category height information
